entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Gananoque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:04 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grenadier Island 09:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 4.0°C
Wind: NNW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and blowing snow near noon. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 late this morning then increasing to 70 gusting to 90 late this afternoon. High 6 with temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
